lexUnit.name: adjustment.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: A (relatively) small change made in some part of a complex system made in order to cause it to function better.

sentence.text: The above brief account throws into sharp relief the essential differences between the Keynesian and classical theories of labour market adjustment .
